text: taman mata væṭēvi yayi ovun adahas karamin siṭina sē (sināyi) kanda ovunṭa ihaḷin mudun vahalayak men navatā tabā, (ovunṭa) “api obaṭa labā dun (dharmaya) tadin allā ganu. ehi æti dæya (sǣmaviṭama) avadhānayen yutuva tabanu. (emagin) oba pariśuddhavantayin bavaṭa pat viya hækiya” (yayi api ovunṭa pævasīma nabiyē!oba ovunṭa matak kara denu)
